programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Tensions run high between Casey and Herrmann after the firehouse responds to an apartment complex fire; after discovering something extremely suspicious during the call, Kidd and Severide do some investigating and get CPD on the case.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide gets angry at Cruz when he feels his orders were disobeyed in the field; Boden reconnects with an old high school friend during a call to a house fire. Herrmann has issues when one of his favorite knick-knacks from Molly's goes missing.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A horrible storm wreaks havoc on Chicago and impacts Firehouse 51 when the power goes off; when a little boy mysteriously shows up at the station, everyone works together to uncover who he belongs to; Foster and Kidd argue about Severide.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Boden search to uncover whether arson was the cause of a fire at a hair salon; Mouch, Herrmann, Otis and Kidd make a startling discovery while tracking down the missing piercing nozzle from Engine 27.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A serial arsonist cold case is reopened when Lt. Severide finds a connection to a recent salon fire; Firehouse 51 celebrates a retirement party.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Kidd continue to investigate Benny's old arson case; unexpected news leads Brett to ponder a big decision; all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman with a seemingly squeaky-clean image is found dead in a fountain; further investigation reveals a surprising motive and multiple suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a janitor violently attacks a coach, the SVU team connects the janitor's behavior to a history of sexual abuse; the detectives find more victims of the same predator -- including a prisoner (Mike Tyson) on death row.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the SVU detectives investigate the alleged rape of a sorority pledge, drunken students and conflicting accounts complicate matters.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two sniper attacks on the NYPD link to Detective Tutuola's past as a narcotics officer, he reconnects with his former partner in hope of finding a motive; Lt. Alexandra Eames helps SVU investigate.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Mornings
programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Everton FC move into their new digs in this match against Brighton & Hove Albion. Everton played at Goodison Park from 1892 to 2025, but will now play at Hill Dickinson Stadium, which opened in February. Brighton won 3-0 at Everton last season.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Mornings
programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Fulham host Manchester United in a Premier League contest. The Red Devils earned a pair of 1-0 victories over the Cottagers last season, but Fulham paid them back in the fifth round of the FA Cup by eliminating Man United on penalties March 2.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a role-play session on a camming website turns violent after one user decides to meet his idol in person.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi takes on a powerful judge when he inexplicably dismisses the rape case of a university student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson teams up with Lt. Barek and the Bronx SVU to track down a serial rapist with victims in both boroughs.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson helps two sisters get closure from a harrowing childhood assault; Kat's cousin reaches out for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU must contend with an angry neighborhood watch group when a girl goes missing near a building that houses several sex offenders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-profile activist suspects her sister has been kidnapped by a hate group; Garland and Benson push for change with NYPD brass; Kat gets some good news.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for three women suspected of drugging and robbing wealthy men; the case leads to personal connections for both Benson and Kat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to investigate an unusual domestic violence case when his neighbor is found injured.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a role-play session on a camming website turns violent after one user decides to meet his idol in person.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi takes on a powerful judge when he inexplicably dismisses the rape case of a university student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson teams up with Lt. Barek and the Bronx SVU to track down a serial rapist with victims in both boroughs.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson helps two sisters get closure from a harrowing childhood assault; Kat's cousin reaches out for help.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators search the world of high rollers and offshore betting to solve the first triple homicide in Verona, Wisc.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a single mom is arrested for leaving her young daughter alone for days, Sgt. Benson suspects the woman may have been abused in her own childhood.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson is assigned a 24/7 security detail when William Lewis (Pablo Schreiber) escapes from prison and starts killing again; Benson must decide how much she is willing to sacrifice to save a child's life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Sgt. Olivia Benson is investigated by Internal Affairs after William Lewis' death; as pressure mounts, Olivia has to choose between her convictions and her badge.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Murphy question a television producer when he is accused of molesting his daughter; Benson strives to discover the truth as accusations fly in the media.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three young girls' search for a mythical character leads to one of them becoming injured and the other two disappearing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The media spotlight shines on Sgt. Benson when she investigates a string of rapes that have similarities with crimes in Atlanta; a family court judge threatens to remove baby Noah from Benson's care.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After being found unconscious in her hotel bathroom, an Atlanta detective -- in town for a law-enforcement conference -- says that she was raped; Rollins discovers a personal connection to the suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager is sexually assaulted and left for dead in an alley after attending a movie star's party; Benson is suspicious when security footage from the party goes missing.

programme.desc: When Amaro's estranged father (Armand Assante) is arrested at his own wedding, Amaro becomes a witness and secrets threaten to tear their family apart.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a teenage girl makes a rape accusation against a person with a criminal record, but little evidence is found, the girl's father takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a female video game developer who has been receiving death threats refuses to delay the launch of her new game, the cops must work to protect her.

programme.desc: Stage three of the 2025 La Vuelta, as the riders journey 139km from Maurizio Canavese to Ceres. This hilly route includes nearly 2,000 metres of elevation gain.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from the opening weekend of the 2025/26 Serie A season, as Napoli begin their title defense with a trip to face Fabio Grosso's Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.

programme.desc: We look back at the eventful 2017/18 UEFA Champions League final between five-time winners Liverpool and Real Madrid, who were hoping to lift their third consecutive title in Kiev.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Stampeders return from a bye to face the Roughriders. Saskatchewan came off its second bye in Week 11, stretching its win streak to four games. Vernon Adams Jr. threw for 428 yards and three TDs to help Calgary past Saskatchewan 24-10 in Week 6.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: Toronto hosts BC. The Argonauts have won four straight meetings. The Lions are 2-0 since their first bye in Week 9. Entering Week 12, BC's Keon Hatcher led the league with 878 receiving yards, while Toronto's Damonte Coxie sat in second with 854.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Blue Bombers and Alouettes begin their season series. The clubs split two meetings in 2024. Sergio Castillo drilled a 47-yard field goal as time expired to lift Winnipeg past Ottawa 30-27 in Week 11. Montreal has lost three consecutive games.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Elks run with the Redblacks in the nation's capital. Edmonton seeks a third straight win after beating Montreal and Toronto. Justin Rankin led the Elks in rushing and receiving and scored two TDs when Edmonton held off Ottawa 39-33 on July 6.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: Toronto hosts BC. The Argonauts have won four straight meetings. The Lions are 2-0 since their first bye in Week 9. Entering Week 12, BC's Keon Hatcher led the league with 878 receiving yards, while Toronto's Damonte Coxie sat in second with 854.
